original_text: And what nation is there so great, that hath statutes and judgments so righteous as all this law, which I set before you this day?
korean_text: 오늘 내가 너희에게 선포하는 이 율법과 같이 그 규례와 법도가 공의로운 큰 나라가 어디 있느냐

sentences.original_text: And what nation is there so great
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그토록 위대한 민족이 어디 있겠습니까

sentences.original_text: that hath statutes and judgments so righteous
which I set before you this day?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 오늘 너희 앞에 둔 것을?
